elements.title: User interface
elements.content: The web-based user interface is implemented in this module. (TODO: - Features - Implementation details (patterns + technologies))

elements.title: Back-end
elements.content:
The business logic and domain model are implemented in this module. It provides the following functionality:

  • Exposing an API to be consumed by users.
  • Authenticating users and authorising user requests.
  • Validates and handles user requests.
  • Handles errors.
  • Caching.

elements.title: Database
elements.content: The database and database management system are implemented in this layer.
